extendedIngredients.name: brussels sprouts
extendedIngredients.original: 1 1/2 lb Brussels sprouts (preferably on the stalk), any discolored leaves discarded and stems left intact
extendedIngredients.originalName: Brussels sprouts (preferably on the stalk), any discolored leaves discarded and stems left intact

extendedIngredients.name: pecorino romano
extendedIngredients.original: 2 tablespoons finely grated Pecorino Romano, or to taste
extendedIngredients.originalName: finely grated Pecorino Romano, or to taste

title: Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Fresh Walnuts and Pecorino
summary: Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Fresh Walnuts and Pecorino might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 6. One portion of this dish contains about 7g of protein, 21g of fat, and a total of 245 calories. For $1.34 per serving, this recipe covers 19% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. If you have pecorino romano, lemon juice, olive oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 35 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 91%, this dish is great. Try Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Apples and Pecorino, Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad With Red Onion, Lemon And Pecorino, and Brussels Sprout Salad with Apple, Walnuts, and Parmesan-Pecorino Crisps for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Holding each Brussels sprout by stem end, cut into very thin slices using slicer. Toss in a bowl to separate layers.                                                                Lightly crush walnuts with your hands and add to Brussels sprouts along with cheese, oil, and lemon juice, then toss to combine. Season with pepper.                                                Cooks' notes:            路 Walnuts can be toasted 1 day ahead and kept in an airtight container at room temperature.路 Brussels sprouts can be sliced 3 hours ahead and chilled, covered. Toss with remaining ingredients just before serving.

steps.step: Holding each Brussels sprout by stem end, cut into very thin slices using slicer. Toss in a bowl to separate layers.
Lightly crush walnuts with your hands and add to Brussels sprouts along with cheese, oil, and lemon juice, then toss to combine. Season with pepper.

路 Walnuts can be toasted 1 day ahead and kept in an airtight container at room temperature.路 Brussels sprouts can be sliced 3 hours ahead and chilled, covered. Toss with remaining ingredients just before serving.
